website_summaries.verdict: A nonstick gourmet press that creates crispy, crunchy, delicious sandwiches and can also grill meat.
pros: Easy to clean thanks to the nonstick plate
Grease flows away from the food via a channeling system
cons: Only one plate is included, and that is the grill plate

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of cap and I only didn't return it because I lost the box. I'm still unhappy with it and will end up buying another anyway.WASTE OF MONEY!! CHEAP!! HARD TO CLEAN BC OF MATERIAL IT'S MADE OF ANDALE THE GREASE FROM THE TOP FLOWS ONTO THE COUNTER WHEN YOU OPEN IT BECAUSE NOTHING CONNECTS THE BACK TO THE BOTTOM PIECE. GRILLED SANDWICHES END UP WITH GRILL MARKS AND THAT'S ALL - IT DOESN'T TOAST ANYTHING. TRIED TO COOK CHICKEN BREAST AND HAD TO MUTILATE IT BC IT WOULD NOT COOK PAST THE OUTER LAYER. SUUUUUUCKS AND I WANT MY MONEY BACK.
customer_reviews.author: Divachic12003

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product but need a better finishing job. The quality of the finishing is poor. Difficult to open as it has a metal to lock it that is always difficult to get rid of to open it. Besides that, it does his job well.
customer_reviews.author: MariCeratti

customer_reviews.title: Great Panini Maker
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product. Food Stays in place while cooking. Bought other Panini machines before and it horrible because the food would slide around. So happy with this machine!.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very efficient
customer_reviews.text: I really like it for a quick steak or a chicken or fish fillet piece. Easy to clean, heats up quickly and easy to use. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna K

customer_reviews.title: one of my favorite buys this year
customer_reviews.text: I love this and grill everything possible on the chef buddy, meat, veggies, sandwiches... really great for rewarming pizza... it comes out nice and crispy. I love that it is easy to clean and my favorite feature is it turns off on it's own so if I forget to unplug it it won't burn itself or anything on my counters

customer_reviews.title: low price .
customer_reviews.text: needs a on off swich .have to unpluge every time..

customer_reviews.title: This is a very smart unit.
customer_reviews.text: It really deserve the 5 stars....I was looking in Walmart a substitute for my old one....but I really thanks I've found it here. I bought it for the ratings, and it really deserve it....I follow the others...it cooks fast the sandwich and the meet drops oil smoothly in the collector. This is a very smart unit.
customer_reviews.author: McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Holds up great has been doing wonderful for a couple months solid ...
customer_reviews.text: We actually use this daily in a retirement community putting out 10-20 panini's on it a day. Holds up great has been doing wonderful for a couple months solid now. We are happy with it. Fast shipping. Only downfall is the plates don't come out so its not super easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Terek Beckman

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth it
customer_reviews.text: This took me back to toulon France and smashed sandwiches when I was in the Navy for 20 years from 1988 to 2008. I absolutely love this. If you were ever in France you know a smashed sandwich. Grab some fries some meat and cheese and smash away. This is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Hohorst

customer_reviews.title: Good panini press
customer_reviews.text: Good for quick paninis. A fun way to make sandwiches at home. A little smaller surface area than the other one we use. But great for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly well for me. Cooking time is quick and easy to clean. Perfect for apartment-style living. I recommend it especially for beginners in the kitchen.

customer_reviews.title: favorite appliance
customer_reviews.text: received this a week ago and have used it 4 times already. Great for leftover turkey sandwiches. I also sprayed with pam and grilled some peppers and onions, and have used to cook hamburger patties. Tonight chicken and mushroom skewers are being tried. Seems so much easier than heating up a big oven. Love it

customer_reviews.title: cooks great but small
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than I expected good for making a couple regular sized sandwiches or regular sized boneless chicken breast.

customer_reviews.title: A fun product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this Panini maker. It is fun to toss a bunch of meats, veggies, etc. in a sandwich or bun and put it into the griller. You can create a myriad of great sandwiches.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gift
customer_reviews.text: My son just moved out and lives in an apartment, this Panini and grill works wonderful for him. He loves it. I'm considering getting one for myself.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Happy I brought it, every home should have one of these Makes great sandwiches & burgers Loving it so much!!

customer_reviews.title: Chef Buddy
customer_reviews.text: Altho the machine does a wonderful job with sandwiches, I was very disappointed with the product itself. I paid for a new machine but feel I must have gotten a used one. The surface was very scratched and there was no green light to indicate when the heating was ready. It wasn't worth my time to return it and go thru the hassle that no doubt would have incurred.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Uran

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for making paninis!
customer_reviews.text: I love the non-stick Chef Buddy Grill and Panini Press. The unit heats up quickly and creates warm paninis in under five minutes with the characteristic grill marks on the bread. It has a grilling area able to fit two sandwiches and an adjustable grill lid for those large sandwiches. We use this item at least three times a week and are well satisfied with its ease of use. The non-stick plates are not removable but it's easy to clean the non-stick surface with a paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr

customer_reviews.title: missing booklet
customer_reviews.text: there is no booklet how long to cook the meat on the grill. It would be nice if there was a booklet with it since they are xmas presents

customer_reviews.title: chef buddy,
customer_reviews.text: could be a little better, a little small would like for it to have a out door taste to it

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap material, it looked like it was falling apart. I was right though, didn’t even turned on at all , it might have been used bc it had scratches. Not recomend it at all, especially for that price
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: No heat control, no plate removal, looks old from beginning
customer_reviews.text: Another bad / cheap product from China. No heat control (food gets very dark fast), no plate removal (hard to clean), looks old (worn) from beginning. Many chipped off edges. Very bad packaging and no product box to store. Only good thing: Non-stick-coating works decent at least at the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: wish I could return
customer_reviews.text: I've used this twice and just don't like it, you have to rotate the sandwich in order for it be passed on both sides even a thin grilled cheese. Unfortunately I waited too long to return it and I'm stuck with it. Would not recommend anyone else purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It super small than the picture and I got one which ...
customer_reviews.text: if you want to throw your money away. just buy it. It super small than the picture and I got one which was scratched then I contacted them to replace it. But I got also one that they didn't cover all the nonstick surface you can still see the underneath layer. Also when you want to close it it would flip because it has just a small leg to balance it.

customer_reviews.title: Great value

product_meta.title: Chef Buddy 80-1840 Panini Press Grill and Gourmet Sandwich Maker for Healthy Cooking by
product_meta.description: You can be the hit of the household by making every meal an unforgettable one with the Panini Press Indoor Grill and Gourmet Sandwich Maker (Red) by Classic Cuisine. The easy to clean, convertible grill turns healthy cooking, grilling, and toasting into a breeze for chefs of all experience levels. It truly makes multifunctional and effortless cooking a reality! IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products. Classic Cuisine is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on our entire line of products, which we ensure by applying a rigorous quality control process.
feature_bullets: MULTI-RECIPE HEALTHY COOKING- Healthier meals are a possibility with the advanced grease channeling system which helps to cut grease and decrease fat from your food while it cooks. Prepare numerous recipes for your family from grilling burgers, steaks, and kebobs, to toasting gourmet sandwiches and paninis, and even cooking breakfast. This electric grill does it all!

LARGE COOKING SURFACE FOR FAST PREP- The 6”x 10” heating plate surface allow for suitable cooking space, no matter what your current cooking needs may be. The 1400-watt dual heating zones also allow for even faster and more energy efficient cooking times.This makes it an ideal option for convenient indoor grilling all-year round
PRODUCT DETAILS- Dimensions: 10"x12"Power Cord: 110V 29” with storage area, Finish: modern brushed steel

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – Classic Cuisine is committed to providing consumers with the absolute best price and value on our entire line of products. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of Classic Cuisine and ONLY Panini Press Indoor Grill and Gourmet Sandwich Maker, by Classic Cuisine are GUARANTEED to be genuine

EASY CLEAN UP- Cleaning should never take you the same amount of time as cooking. With the non-stick surface, two grease catchers, and cleaner spatula, you can finish your cleanup in just minutes and without the hassle!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
